title: How to Do It: No One Tells You What Happens When You’re Suddenly a Hot Guy
description:
This week, Stoya and Rich discuss a letter from a man whose attractiveness is getting in the way of his life and work.
***
Read the How to Do It column on Slate here. If you’re in need of sex advice from Stoya and Rich, write in here or leave a voicemail at ‪(347) 640-4025 and we may use it on the show. Remember, it’s anonymous—and nothing is too embarrassing!
Production by Chau Tu.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: The women in their 20s are the worst.
